Articles.Content:
KSP: 1.0.3 win32

Problem: The solar system does not exist except for KSC.

Reproduction steps unknown.

![KUph0SA.png](http://i.imgur.com/KUph0SA.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-23T15:03:05Z" title="06/23/2015 03:03  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 23, 2015</time> by FireFaced**
You do seem to have a lot mods installed. I'd recommend uninstalling all those mods and then try again. Besides, those mods may not be updated just yet for 1.0.3 so the mods maybe the cause.

Yeah, I'm trying just essential mods now.

- - - Updated - - -

Okay, some mod was causing it.
